column1: [[Image:SnowTroll.jpg|thumb|200px|right|A Snow-troll in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II|The Battle for Middle-earth 2: The Rise of the Witch-king]]]]

column2: living in an environment of snow and ice. No tale is told of Snow-trolls
column3: so whether they existed (in the [[Northern Waste]]) remains open to debate.

column1: During the [[Long Winter]] of {{TA|2758}} and {{TA|2759|n}} that lay upon the fields of [[Rohan]]
column2: [[Helm|Helm Hammerhand]] clad himself in white and stalked the camps of the [[Dunlendings]] "like a snow-troll"
column3: and killed many with (seemingly) his bare hands. It remained a legend in [[Dunland]]
column4: striking fear and [[Forgoil|hatred]] into any who heard it.<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]

column1: : Snow Trolls are large (10-12 ft tall)
column3: who prey the northern regions of Middle-earth
column4: They turn into pillars of icy slag

column1: '''2006: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]]'':'''
:Snow Trolls are a playable unit in the [[Angmar]] faction
column2: being one of the strongest units not only in the faction but also in the game. They are equipped with pickaxes
column3: helmets and small shields. Snow trolls can be used also in the ''Create-a-hero'' section.

column1: '''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'':'''
:A Snow-troll fought in the army of [[Skorgrím Dourhand]] during the [[Battle of Edhelion]]. He destroyed the city's gate and tried to kill [[Dorongúr Whitethorn]] and the player
column2: but was slain himself by [[Elrond]] before he could complete his attempt.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]

column1: '''2011: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'':'''
:Snow-trolls are encountered on the slopes of Mount [[Gundabad]]. They are implied to be hostile
column2: even to the various Orcs and Trolls gathering at the mountain.
